titleStmt.title: A probleme propounded by Francis Dillingham, in which is plainely shewed, that the holy scriptures haue met with popish arguments and opinions.
titleStmt.author: Dillingham, Francis, d. 1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by William Iones, and are to be sold by Ed. Weauer,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
